preqs: Students must be enrolled in Bachelor of Commerce (Honours) to undertake this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0171, 0181, 3818, B6003}
Unit was previously coded {ACC5120, ACC7120, AFF5120%, AFX4120%, BFX4120}

description: This unit will examine empirical research in asset pricing and investments. It will develop students knowledge and ability to apply empirical techniques to conduct research in asset pricing and investments.
